forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 65. West southwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn gently breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the air carries a faint chill, whispering hints of marine layers still lingering nearby. The skies, adorned with scattered clouds, promise a daytime transformation; the forecast predicts a delightful embrace of sunshine to emerge by afternoon. This gradual warming, with temperatures reaching the mid-60s, hints at a day inviting for exploration and gentle strolls through the city’s vibrant streets.

While mist may hang low in some corners — perhaps tempering the view of the iconic Golden Gate — there is a splendid clarity beckoning from above. As the day progresses, the encouraging warmth from the west-southwest winds offers a refreshing backdrop to ventures outside, whether it’s savoring a quiet moment in a local café or meandering through Golden Gate Park, observing the lush landscapes animate in the daylight. Dress comfortably, perhaps in layers, to embrace both the cool morning and the cheerful afternoon. A light sweater may do well as you step out to enjoy this congenial Californian day, with the sun casting warmth on both the land and your spirit.
